geode.name: Geode
geode.desc: A rock that's shiny inside. Can be broken into ore, gems, and something special.

scrap_armor.name: Scrap Armor
scrap_armor.desc: Cheap armor, cobbled together from second-hand materials. Not very effective, but certainly cheap.

geo_armor.name: Geo Armor
geo_armor.desc: Rocky armor that seems to regenerate itself slightly. Very durable, but can be pierced by heavy weapons.

mite_nibble.name: Mite Nibble
mite_nibble.desc: Tiny crystal teeth that can cut rock.

mite_bite.name: Mite Bite
mite_bite.desc: Crystal teeth that can cut rock.

atomic_breath.name: Atomic Breath
atomic_breath.desc: Ridiculously powerful breath attack of the mitezilla.
